title: a very enjoyable movie, and really interesting and scary movie
review: when i first saw the trailer, i wasn't that interested in seeing this movie, but after watching it in cinema, i really loved it. the acting of bill skarsgard was very convincing for me. i don't know why all the hate for this movie, i find it very interesting and enjoyable to watch.the director done a very good job in this movie, also in mama i loved the way how the character moves.
